name: BrokerArchive-Container
description: This is an example of how to deploy a BAR in a container to an OpenShift Cluster

components.name: BrokerArchive-Container-Baked
components.description: This is an example of deployment using the Baked approach for ACE container deployment

cachedAuthTokenRestriction.name: System Default
cachedAuthTokenRestriction.description: Used by default for any plugin steps without a specified token restriction

properties.scriptBody:
#!/bin/bash
export KUBECONFIG=./kubeconfig
oc login --token ${p:environment/oc-auth-token} --server=https://c100-e.us-east.containers.cloud.ibm.com:30603
echo "I am user ${id}"
echo "My home directory is $HOME"
oc project ucd
echo "My current OpenShift project is $(oc project)"
echo "Pods running in this namespace are" 
oc get pods
